page.syntax: Color_List as C = Enumerate as C([flags as c[,format as c]])

argument.name: Color_List
argument.description: A list of defined color names.

page.description: Enumerate named color - optional flags 'H'tml colors 'S'ystem colors , 'A'lpha Five colors, 'F'ullnames .
page.discussion: The ColorDefinition.Enumerate() method returns a list of defined color names.
page.example: dim cc as colordefinition ? cc.Enumerate() = Black White Red Blue Bright Green Turquoise Yellow ... HTML-Black HTML-Silver HTML-Gray HTML-White HTML-Maroon HTML-Red ...
